AbstractBlog

public AbstractBlog(java.lang.String root)
Creates a new Blog instance, based at the specified location. Note: You must call init() before being able to use this object -

Parameters:
root - an absolute path pointing to the root directory of the blog

protected void init()
Call this method to initialize this object before using it. As this method may call some abstract methods, it should be called either last from the topmost constructor or from the outside just after construction.
